meanings: Verb (두 단어나 음절이) 운이 맞다[각운을 이루다]
Noun 라임(레몬 비슷하게 생긴 작은 녹색 과일)
Verb (땅의 산성화를 막기 위해) 석회를 뿌리다
Transitive verb 석회를 뿌리다, 석회로 소독하다, 석회수에 담그다

vlive.korean: 라임! Oh! The rhyme! 듣기 View video ASTRO : 초콜릿스트로🍫
이거 라임이에요? Is this a lime? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 게임의 정석
라임 좀 치네? You're pretty good at rhyming. 듣기 View video VICTON : 쉬는시간😁
라임 2가 나오겠는데? I think 2 limes will come out. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 연준 : 게임의 정석
vlive.english: I think 2 limes will come out.

vlive.korean: 뭐야 이게? 라임? 복숭아다! What is it? Lime? Peach! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 연준 : 게임의 정석

examples.korean: I’ll have a vodka and lime. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 라임을 넣은 보드카 한 잔 주세요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ll have a vodka and lime. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I heard he doesn’t even write his own rhymes. All of his stuff is ghostwritten. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 라임조차 쓰지 않는다고 들었어. 전부 다 유령 작가가 써준 거래. DARAKWON
examples.english: I heard he doesn’t even write his own rhymes. All of his stuff is ghostwritten. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She and her family lived at the Lime Rock Lighthouse. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀와 가족은 라임 록 등대에서 살았다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She and her family lived at the Lime Rock Lighthouse. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: These include orange, lemon, lime and grapefruit juices. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 즙들에는 오렌지, 레몬, 라임, 그리고 포도 즙이 포함된다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: These include orange, lemon, lime and grapefruit juices. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The limejuice and the Bitters must be added before the Ginger Ale. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 반드시 라임주스와 비터즈를 진저 에일보다 먼저 섞어야 합니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The limejuice and the Bitters must be added before the Ginger Ale. Add to Wordbook
